mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hireinfo ( hire_no, hire_title, hire_body, user_id, hire_date, hire_deadline, hire_add, hire_salary, hire_edu, reg_id, reg_dt, mod_id, mod_dt ) VALUES ( #{hireNo}, #{hireTitle}, #{hireBody}, #{userId}, #{hireDate}, #{hireDeadline}, #{hireAdd}, #{hireSalary}, #{hireEdu}, #{userId}, sysdate, #{userId}, sysdate )
mapper.select: SELECT hire_no, hire_title, hire_body, user_id, hire_date, hire_deadline, hire_add, hire_salary, hire_edu FROM hireinfo WHERE hire_no = #{hireNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE hireinfo SET hire_title = #{hireNo}, hire_body = #{hireBody}, hire_date = #{hireDate}, hire_deadline = #{hireDeadline}, hire_add = #{hireAdd}, hire_salary = #{hireSalary}, hire_edu = #{hireEdu}, mod_id = #{modId}, mod_dt = sysdate WHERE hire_no = #{hireNo}
